title: IN GAME CHAT
body: Well i still don't understand why there isn't a disable chat permantly before you go into game how much better the game will become people will be able to preform better if they can't FLAME yes people should be able to control them selfs but some people can't as they have anger issues or even illnesses RIOT do the right thing for one (BUILD THAT WALL) give a delete chat option before game

replies.body: People who cant communicate are a liability to their team and should be treated like other trolls/inters. They are unfit to be playing a cooperative game.

What about when people are boosted or just bad and cost you the whole game which is like 50% of the games and some people need to be told. Why there should be and option to disable chat before game as some people do have issues with bad players. Myself included which when i have a chat ban i win more games

Still a liability compared to someone who can communicate. It is not about _you_, it is about the other players.

Just mute the boosted monkeys when they appear.
